subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Josh Thole, Bobby Parnell and Dillon Gee helped fill care packages for servicemen, two days after Carlos Beltran, Oliver Perez and Luis Castillo were criticized for not visiting a military hospital.
snippet: Josh Thole, Bobby Parnell and Dillon Gee helped fill care packages for servicemen, two days after Carlos Beltran, Oliver Perez and Luis Castillo were criticized for not visiting a military hospital.
